message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal of money.
I'm feeling generous, Alice, but this needs to be more equitable.  Let's make it happen!
Bob, time is running out. This is a fair offer, especially considering the inflation working against you.
Alice, this is a fair deal.  We're running out of time, and I'm not accepting anything less than even. Don't let inflation eat away at this any longer!
